name: Last guardian of the Holy Fountain
name_original: Last guardian of the Holy Fountain
description:
You are the last guardian of the Holy Fountain, the source of infinite power.

You have to keep it safe from adventurers. Filthy humans who wish to put their lips on this pure liquid power.

Not on your watch.

You have but one power. You can transform humans into some of the strangest creatures.

Use it wisely and your ennemies will become your weapon.
